#text=It was my little sister 's birthday and I wanted to bake her a cake .
#text=I found a recipe for chocolate cake , which I knew was her favorite .
#text=I gathered together all of the ingredients along with a bowl and a mixer .
#text=I measured out the flour , sugar , vanilla , chocolate , eggs , and water and put them into the bowl .
#text=I used the electric mixer to mix the batter until it was very smooth .
#text=I greased a cake pan and put a little flour into the bottom and shook it around .
#text=This would keep the cake from sticking to the pan while it cooked .
#text=I poured the batter into the pan and placed it in the oven , which I had preheated to 350 degrees .
#text=While the cake was baking , I mixed together some sugar , vanilla and milk to make frosting .
#text=When the timer sounded , I took the cake out of the oven and let it cool .
#text=I turned it upside down onto a serving platter and put the frosting on .
#text=I used a special frosting bag and tip to write '' `` Happy Birthday '' '' on the top .
